resources.string: The game\'s objective is to slide numbered tiles on a grid to combine them to create a tile with the number 2048. However, one can continue to play the game after reaching the goal, creating tiles with larger numbers.
Where you must identify the two cards that have the same face. Game is finished when all cards are identified. Less flips used mean better score.
A Puzzle Game where you must arrange the numbers in the correct order. You can earn a higher socre by choosing harder level of difficulty, moving faster and \'Undo\' less.
